install.name: Hover Box V2.15
install.author: Anthony Olsen
install.copyright: This module is released under the GNU/GPL License.
install.description: Hoverbox 2.16 | native to Joomla 1.5 | Please check the joomlabamboo website for configuration details. www.joomlabamboo.com

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: ref_mootools
param.label: Reference mootools?
param.description: You only need to reference one verison of mootools. (not xhtml valid)

param.name: ref_css
param.label: Reference Hover Box CSS?
param.description: Use this method if you dont want to add anything to your template (not xhtml valid)

param.name: ref_slimbox
param.label: Reference Slimbox?
param.description: Use this method if you dont want to add anything to your template (not xhtml valid)

param.name: ref_zoom
param.label: Reference the Zoom Box script?
param.description: Use this method if you dont want to add anything to your template (not xhtml valid)

param.name: ref_tips
param.label: Reference the Mootips script for the tooltip effect?
param.description: Use this method if you dont want to add anything to your template (not xhtml valid)

param.name: directory
param.label: Directory for images
param.description: Relative directory where images are stored. Please not no trailing slash required.

param.name: hb_height
param.label: Gallery Height in px.
param.description: Height of the entire hb. Use this setting to make more or less room for your images and the module position.

param.name: hb_width
param.label: Gallery Width in px or %.
param.description: Width of the entire hb. Use this setting to make more or less room for your images and the module position.

param.name: thumb_width
param.label: Width of thumbnail div in px or %
param.description: Width of the div that holds the thumbnails.

param.name: margin
param.label: Margin for thumbnail div
param.description: Use this setting to position the thumbnail div around the gallery container. Use top right bottom left e.g. 2px 4px 3px 5px. If in doubt leave as 0.

param.name: id
param.label: Gallery Layout
param.description: The direction describes the direction the hover effect is displayed relative to the thumbnails.

param.name: thumbnoo_width
param.label: Width of image if using Zoom Box Effect.
param.description: This option is only necessary if using the Zoom Box effect. Just put the number here ... no need to use px

param.name: thumbnoo_height
param.label: Height of image if using Zoom Box Effect.
param.description: This option is only necessary if using the Zoom Box effect. Just put the number here ... no need to use px

param.name: tips
param.label: Use Tooltips
param.description: Do you want to display the image title in a tool tip?

param.name: tips_x
param.label: Horizontal tooltip offset
param.description: Offsets from the thumbnail. Just put the number here ... no need to use px

param.name: tips_y
param.label: Vertical tooltip offset
param.description: Offsets from the thumbnail. This option is only necessary if using the Zoom Box effect. Just put the number here ... no need to use px

param.name: pre_pub
param.label: Publish pre text?
param.description: Do you want to display this question?

param.name: pretext
param.label: Text above the gallery.
param.description: Place your content here. HTML Tags allowed.

param.name: post_pub
param.label: Publish post text?
param.description: Do you want to display this question?

param.name: posttext
param.label: Text below the gallery.
param.description: Place your content here. HTML Tags allowed.

param.name: image1
param.label: Full size image for Image 1
param.description: Name of image including the file suffix.

param.name: thumb1
param.label: Thumbnail image for Image 1
param.description: Name of image including the file suffix.

param.name: t1
param.label: Image Title
param.description: Complete this field for title description on slideshow or for the tooltip. The correct format for use with the tooltip is for the title of the tooltip to be separated by the body with

param.name: a1
param.label: Image Alt Tag
param.description: Complete this field for alt tag and greater accessibility.

param.name: gallery1
param.label: Gallery Name
param.description: Group images together in a gallery - use a unique gallery name for separate groups of images.

param.name: linkme1
param.label: How would you like to display the popup?
param.description: Do you want to display the following images?

param.name: link1
param.label: Slimbox Hyperlink
param.description: Group images together in a gallery - use a unique gallery name for separate groups of images.

param.name: height1
param.label: Height of Popup for Link
param.description: Group images together in a gallery - use a unique gallery name for separate groups of images.

param.name: width1
param.label: Width of Popup for Link
param.description: Group images together in a gallery - use a unique gallery name for separate groups of images.

param.description: Group images together in a gallery - use a unique gallery name for separate groups of images.

param.description: Group images together in a gallery - use a unique gallery name for separate groups of images.
